Label meaning: A unique identification number of a newspaper, taken from the first 9 digits of the MARC record 097 $ a field
标签含义: 一种报纸的唯一标识号，取自MAＲC 记录097 $ a 字段前9 位

Label meaning: The name of the newspaper, 200 $ a in the MARC record
标签含义: 报纸名称，MAＲC 记录中的200 $ a

Label meaning: 8 digits, 4 digits year + 2 digits month + 2 digits day, such as published on February 12, 1936 becomes  19360212
The volume or issue number of each issue of the newspaper, such as the 72nd, becomes 72
标签含义: 每期报纸的卷号或期号，如第七十二号，则为72

Label meaning: The corresponding edition of the XML file
标签含义: 该版XML 文件对应的版次

Label meaning: The position information of the title of the article, recorded in the form of pixels
标签含义: 篇目标题的位置信息，以像素点的形式记录

Label meaning: The overall location information of the article, recorded in the form of pixels
标签含义: 篇目整体的位置信息，以像素点的形式记录

Label meaning: The content of the article on this edition is not finished, the content on the subsequent edition
标签含义: 篇目在本版上的内容未完，在后接版上的内容

Label meaning: attached picture included in the title
标签含义: 篇目中含有的附属图片
